message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $95 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $95 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $110?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I can't go above $100 for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
